metadata.title: CVE-2020-13249 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libmariadb/mariadb_lib.c in MariaDB Connector/C before 3.1.8 does notproperly validate the content of an OK packet received from a server. NOTE:although mariadb_lib.c was originally based on code shipped for MySQL, thisissue does not affect any MySQL components supported by Oracle.

criterions.comment: mariadb-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
